base_frame.description: The undistortion algorithm is based on a base frame, which must be the same as the twist frame.

use_imu.description: Use IMU angular velocity, otherwise, use twist angular velocity.

use_3d_distortion_correction.description: Use 3d distortion correction algorithm, otherwise, use 2d distortion correction algorithm.

self_crop.min_x.description: minimum x-coordinate value for self cropping in meters

self_crop.min_y.description: minimum y-coordinate value for self cropping in meters

self_crop.min_z.description: minimum z-coordinate value for self cropping in meters

self_crop.max_x.description: maximum x-coordinate value for self cropping in meters

self_crop.max_y.description: maximum y-coordinate value for self cropping in meters

self_crop.max_z.description: maximum z-coordinate value for self cropping in meters

mirror_crop.min_x.description: minimum x-coordinate value for mirror cropping in meters

mirror_crop.min_y.description: minimum y-coordinate value for mirror cropping in meters

mirror_crop.min_z.description: minimum z-coordinate value for mirror cropping in meters

mirror_crop.max_x.description: maximum x-coordinate value for mirror cropping in meters

mirror_crop.max_y.description: maximum y-coordinate value for mirror cropping in meters

mirror_crop.max_z.description: maximum z-coordinate value for mirror cropping in meters
